Developer Terms of Use
des:
Heart Speak is an online storytelling service that offers uplifting messages to people with issues in their lives.

Some stories (or "GEM"s) aim just to make the listener feel good, but many others will motivate with words of wisdom about problems that all human beings face, such as anxiety, loneliness, loss of a loved one, etc. GEMs are entertaining, uplifting, insightful, and inspiring. Each GEM is an audio message about two minutes long. Each day, a fresh GEM is highlighted as the GEM of the Day. 

The Heart Speak Sampler skill provides a selection of GEMs that introduce you to GEMs and what they can do for you.

Each GEM has one or more subject areas, which summarize the topic of the GEM. Some of the subject areas that are covered:

- Animals & Pets
- Anxiety
- Bullying
- Disability
- Discrimination
- Faith
- Gardening
- Gratitude
- Grief
- Healing
- Loneliness
- Love & Forgiveness
- Relaxation
- Self-doubt
- Therapies

Hundreds more GEMs are available at the Heart Speak website, which is at: https://www.heartspeak.life.

All GEMs may be heard, on demand, using the Heart Speak Audio GEMs app, available in the Google Play store. You can search by topic or keyword across all GEMs, read comments, build playlists, contact us, contribute GEMs, and do much more!
